verses.name: Isaiah 66:6
verses.text: A voice of noise from the city, a voice from the temple, a voice of the Lord that rendereth recompence to his enemies.

verses.name: Isaiah 66:7
verses.text: Before she travailed, she brought forth; before her pain came, she was delivered of a man child.

verses.name: Isaiah 66:8
verses.text: Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day? or shall a nation be born at once? for as soon as Zion travailed, she brought forth her children.
